question: Will there be graduation pictures?
answer: Yes. There will be a livestream at twitch.tv/quaranteens and your name will be read publicly in chat.

question: How much does it cost to attend?
answer: It's free! However, you will need a Minecraft account to log onto the graduation server.

question: Will there be accommodations at the event?
answer: We will have light refreshments. Gowns (leather armor) will be provided.

question: Who can attend?
answer: We ask that only graduating seniors walk - this is on the honor system. If you are a proud parent or friend, there will be seats for you in the audience (which will also be livestreamed).
